[Donald] Pronto dente.
You know he writes his own fan mail.

translation.en: Spot opened up, and it's yours if you want it.

translation.en: Just one condition. Promise me you won't get all weird.

translation.en: We're just a group of guys singing a bunch of covers of songs, okay?

translation.en: If you get weird, they will definitely not let you stay.

translation.en: Deal. Although I don't know what you mean by weird.
translation.fr: Ça marche. Mais je sais pasce que t'entends par zarbe.

translation.en: Got it.
I have been there for you for so many years, and all you do is treat me like…
translation.fr: Je suis là depuis des annéeset tu me traites...

translation.en: All right, no, okay, just shut up! Everyone!
Come on, I joined this group so I could hang out with a bunch of really cool chicks.
translation.fr: J'ai choisi ce groupepour fréquenter des nanas cool.

translation.en: And also 'cause I was really sick of all my boyfriends
and I need to get away from that.
But this is some serious horseshit.
translation.fr: Mais là, on est grave dans la merde.

translation.en: What's that smell? Stinks everywhere.
I don't wanna be like the old Bellas.
Yeah, I wanna be how we are now.
[quietly] Me, too.
We should have listened to Beca.
-Oh, so it's my fault? -That's not what I'm saying.
No, no, no, that's what you're all thinking, isn't it?
translation.fr: C'est ce que vous pensez toutes, hein ?

translation.en: That I'm the jerk. I am the girl obsessed with winning.
translation.fr: Je suis cellequi ne pense qu'à gagner !

translation.en: Aubrey, you're too controlling and it's gonna ruin all of us.

translation.en: You know what, I can lose control if I want to.

translation.en: I can let go. This time I'm not gonna choke it down.
translation.fr: Je peux lâcher prise ! Je vais plus me retenir !

translation.en: Come on, bring it! You can do better than that!

translation.en: Enough! Enough!
We could have been champions!
Give me the pitch pipe, you bitch!
Give it to me!
Give it to me! Give it to me!
Never! I'll protect you. I'll protect you.
translation.fr: - Ça va pas ?- Je te protège.

translation.en: Hands off the goodies!
-That's enough! -[blows whistle]
Move, you bitches!
Guys!
Guys, stop! What is going on?
Nothing. Nothing. This is a Bellas rehearsal.
I know. I just
wanted to say that I'm sorry.
What I did was a really dick move
translation.fr: Ce que j'ai fait, c'était con.

translation.en: and I shouldn't have changed the set without asking you guys.

translation.en: And I definitely shouldn't have left.
I let you guys down and I'm really sorry.
Aubrey, if you would have me, I want back in.
Wait.
Thank you. That would have been embarrassing.
Beca, I know that I've been hard on you, okay?
I know that I have been hard on everyone here.
But I am my father's daughter.
translation.fr: Mais je tiens de mon père.

translation.en: [voice breaking] And he always said, "If at first you don't succeed,
translation.fr: Il disait toujours : "Si tu réussis pas du premier coup,

translation.en: pack your bags."
-Jesus. -That's really crazy.
I get it. Mine gets on me, too.
translation.fr: Je comprends. Le mien me gonfle aussi.

translation.en: Not like that, but…
I guess we don't really know that much about each other.
About most of you, really.
Well, I'll confess something that none of you know about me.

translation.en: I have a lot of sex.
Yeah, we know, Stacie.
Only 'cause I just told you.
This is a good idea.
That was a pretty bad example, but this is a good idea.
Why don't we all go around the room,
translation.fr: Je propose que, chacune son tour,

translation.en: and we can all say something about ourselves that nobody else knows.
translation.fr: on dise un truc sur nousque personne ne sait.

translation.en: Okay, I got something.
This is hard for me to admit to you guys.
translation.fr: C'est pas facile à avouer pour moi.

translation.en: I think we all know where this is going. Les be honest.
translation.fr: On connaît toutes la suite. Lesbien raisonnable ?

translation.en: Well, for the last two years, I've had a serious
gambling problem.
-What? -What?
It started when I broke up with my girlfriend.
translation.fr: Depuis que j'ai quitté ma nana.

translation.en: ♪ Whoomp! There it is ♪
[mouthing] I still love you.
[Beca] Anyone else?
[quietly] I ate my twin in the womb.
Fat Amy?
I'm an open book.
I mean, for God's sake, you guys all call me Fat Amy.
See, I guess I'm just not really living if I'm not being 100% honest.
translation.fr: Je peux pas profiter de la vie si je suis pas honnête à 100 %.

translation.en: And my real name is Fat Patricia.
translation.fr: Mon vrai nom,c'est Patricia la Baleine.

translation.en: Okay. I've never been one of those girls
who had a lot of friends who were girls. And I do now.
translation.fr: à avoir plein de copines. Maintenant, si.

translation.en: And that's pretty cool.
So, that's me. Someone else please go.
Over spring break, I made the courageous decision to remove my nodes.

translation.en: I know. The doctor said that I can't sing above a G-sharp,
translation.fr: Je sais. Le médecin a dit que je dépasseraispeut-être plus le sol dièse

translation.en: maybe ever.
[sobbing] I thought the season was over.
translation.fr: Je croyais que la saison était finie.

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay.
Beca, what do we do?
I'm sorry.
Maybe not here.
All right. Let's remix this business.
Um, Aubrey, would you pick a song for us, please?

translation.en: Bruno Mars, "Just the Way You Are".
translation.fr: Bruno Mars, Just the Way You Are.

translation.en: Okay. Chloe, are you okay to take the lead?
Hands in.
What was that?
I don't know, I've never made that sound before.
Yo, but with your messed up vocal cords, you could hit the bass notes.

translation.en: Do you know what that means?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que ça signifie ?

translation.en: Yes, Lilly?
I think I have something that can help us out.

translation.en: Excuse me, bitch, you don't need to shout.
translation.fr: Ça va,pas la peine de crier.

translation.en: [John] Welcome to the finals
of the 2012 International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
translation.fr: Bienvenue à la finale du championnat universitairede chant a cappella.

translation.en: Lincoln Center is proud to welcome back all of these young hopefuls tonight
translation.fr: Nous sommes fiers d'accueillirtous ces jeunes

translation.en: who are hoping to win a trophy by making music with their mouths.
translation.fr: qui rêvent de gagneren faisant de la musique avec la bouche.

translation.en: [John] This is gonna be a big night, and I tell you, Gail,
-if you can just shut your eyes. -[Gail] I'm doing it.
translation.fr: Si vous fermez les yeux... C'est fait.

translation.en: Shut your eyes and get rid of all the a-ca-politics,
then you can remember that being at Lincoln Center, in the Big Apple,
translation.fr: vous comprendrez qu'être ici,en plein New York,

translation.en: and singing on this storied stage is the dream of every a cappella singer.
translation.fr: et chanter sur cette scène, est le rêve de tout chanteur a cappella.

translation.en: [Gail] You said it, John.
[emcee] The University of Virginia Hullabahoos, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.fr: Les Chari-Ravis de Virginie,mesdames et messieurs.

translation.en: [emcee] Welcome back to the International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
This next group, they need no introduction, but I'll do it anyway!
translation.fr: On ne présente plus le groupe suivant, mais je le fais quand même !

translation.en: Uh, good luck.
Thanks. You, too.
[emcee] …the Treblemakers!
[Gail] Oh, the Trebles closing it strong like always.
[John] Absolutely tight. It's gonna be very hard to beat that tonight.
translation.fr: Un sans-faute. Ça sera très dur de les battre.

translation.en: [Gail] Every other group has their work cut out for them, John.
translation.fr: Les autres groupesont du souci à se faire.

translation.en: [John] I'm glad it's not us anymore, Gail. Those days are over, thank goodness.
translation.fr: Par chance, ce n'est plus nous.Cette époque est révolue.

translation.en: [Gail] Especially since they wouldn't have us back.
translation.fr: Surtout qu'on ne veut plus de nous.

translation.en: I love you, awesome nerds.
Yeah, you guys are the best.
Even though some of you are pretty thin, I think that you all have fat hearts,
translation.fr: Y a des crevettes parmi vous,mais vous avez toutes un cœur XXL.

translation.en: -and that's what matters. -[woman] Aw.
Okay, let's just smash this. Okay?
[emcee] Ladies and gentlemen, the Barden Bellas!
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs,les Bellas de Barden !

translation.en: [John] Oh, my goodness gracious. Will you look at this?
Gone are those Bella uniforms and this is a whole new look for them,
translation.fr: Adieu, l'uniforme des Bellas. Elles ont changé de looket c'est tant mieux !

translation.en: and it is hot, hot, hot.
translation.fr: Elles ont changé de looket c'est tant mieux !

translation.en: [Gail] John, these girls could turn me.
[woman in audience] We love you, Bellas!
Way to go, Beca!
[John] What a show!
I think we have just seen some a cappella history being made, John.

translation.en: And from an all-female group, Gail. I could never have called this one.

translation.en: Never. Well, you are a misogynist at heart,
so there's no way you would have bet on these girls to win.

translation.en: Absolutely.
Ladies and gentlemen, let's give it up again for the Barden Bellas!

translation.en: Told you. Endings are the best part.

translation.en: You're such a weirdo.
Listen up, a-ca-ballers.
I have been rejected by the Army, shoved into a Dora the Explorer backpack,
translation.fr: On m'a refusé à l'armée, fourrédans un sac Dora l'Exploratrice

translation.en: And with the assistance of my boy, Justin…
My liege.
I launch this year's auditions.
-Belly roll. -[drumming]
